<template>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'App',
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}
html{
  background-color: #ffffff;
}
body{
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.welcome{
  height:unset;
  color: #022970;
  background-color: #ffffff;
}
.full{
    color: #022970;
}
.input{
  display: block;
  padding: 38px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
}
.login{
  width: 400px;
  height: 410px;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  background-color: #022970;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
.login input{
  width: 300px;
  height: 40px;
  padding-left: 10px;
  display: block;
  margin-top: auto;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: 1px solid #ffffff;
}
.login button:hover{
  transition: 0.2s ease-in;
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
}
.login button{
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  padding-left: 10px;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: 1px solid #ffffff;
  background: #ffffff;
  color: #022970;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.login h1{
  color:white; 
  padding-top: 30px; 
  margin: auto;
  font-size: 30px;
  font-family: 'Helvetica';
}
.login h2{
  color: white; 
  margin-top: 20px;
  margin: auto;
}
p{
  width:60px;
  background-color: #022970; 
}
.error{
  width:400px;
  background-color: #022970; 
}
.actions button{
  width: 90%;
  height: 150px;
  padding-left: 10px;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: 1px solid #022970;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: #022970;
  color: #ffffff;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.actions button:hover{
  transition: 0.2s ease-in;
  background-color: #002390;
}
textarea {
  width: 80%;
  height: 600px;
  margin-top: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: #022970;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-family: 'Monaco', courier, monospace;
  padding: 20px;
}
.send button{
  width: 50%;
  height: 60px;
  padding-left: 10px;
  display: block;
  margin-top: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: 1px solid #022970;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: #022970;
  color: #ffffff;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.send button:hover{
  transition: 0.2s ease-in;
  background-color: #002390;
}
.accept button{
  width: 50%;
  height: 60px;
  padding-left: 10px;
  display: block;
  margin-top: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  border: 1px solid #022970;
  border-radius: 5px;
  background: #022970;
  color: #ffffff;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.accept button:hover{
  transition: 0.2s ease-in;
  background-color: #002390;
}
img{
  margin-top: 30px;
  width: 50%;

}
</style>
